descriptionHtml:
Darri is a character I made many months ago. I thought I might as well share him with you.
He has gone through some cosmetic changes through the months, but his face is the same and you can change hair, beards, eyes, ect to your liking. 
I made a little gif!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/hZ8zh2x.gif[/img]

You will need:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi[/url] (He will look VERY different without it!)

Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31332/?]Weathered and Worn Warpaint[/url] (Seen in some of the pics)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] (male version) (Eyeliner used in some pics)
SAM Body (Google for it)

If you don't want to use Fine Face textures for all your Skyrim males, this preset should work perfectly fine for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]Ningheim Race[/url].
author: Kamihana
